name: Off With Your Head!
description:
Off With Your Head is an alternate history roguelike, set in a fantasy version of 18th century Paris. The French Revolution has been stamped out by the arcane might of the aristocracy, and fear of execution clogs the hearts of working folk all over France. As an undead noble, brought back to the world of the living by a mysterious power, you must fight the strange denizens of Paris on your way to the King. Changing out your withering limbs for those of the freshly slain helps you gain the strength you’ll need to take the King’s head before he takes yours… again.


Credits: 

Character Artist: Jamie Vodden (https://www.artstation.com/thesmokinguy)
